text: Kumkum (born Zaibunnissa; 22 April 1934 – 28 July 2020) was an Indian actress. She was born in Hussainabad, Sheikhpura district, Bihar. From 1954 to 1973, she appeared in 115 movies. Her best known roles were in Ganga Maiyya Tohe Piyari Chadhaibo, Mr. X in Bombay and Gunah Aur Kanoon. Kumkum died on 28 July 2020 at the age of 86.86 की उम्र में अभिनेत्री कुमकुम का निधन, किशोर कुमार और गुरु दत्त के संग किया था काम ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:People from Bihar
title: Kumkum (actress)
